Contract Regulation
It Is requested that a contract be negotiated with
the NAJSB for the preparation of radio English-teaching
materials* The intention of this contract should be twofold:
(1) to provide for the delivery of certain materials and
services within, a stated period of time and In return for
the payment, at stated intervals, of the sub of $6,545*00;
and (2) tof provide for the continued preparation and
delivery of such materials and services, subject to the
availability of funds and the consent of both contracting
parties *
